lead_paragraph: WIESEL--Elie. The Board of Directors of Gatestone Institute mourn the loss of their esteemed Board of Advisors Member Elie Wiesel. He was the moral conscience of the world, speaking out against injustices on behalf of all of us. The world will be a sadder place without him. Deepest condolences to dear Marion, Elisha and all the family. May his memory be an inspiration. Nina Rosenwald, President Naomi Hass-Perlman, Vice President 1/3
